names.english: decoction of eight ingredients for dispelling wind
names.commonEnglish: Decoction of Eight Ingredients for Dispelling Wind

actions: Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and generates fluids.
Clears Heat, relieves toxicity and clears Blood Heat.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, opens the channels and alleviates pain.
Breaks up Blood Stasis and invigorates Blood circulation.
With Hong Hua, invigorates the Blood for all types of Blood Stagnation.
Clears Wind-Heat, expels Dampness and stops itching.
With Sheng Di Huang and Bai Xian Pi, for Damp-Heat or Wind-Heat causing eczema and itching.
Dispels Wind, disperses Wind-Heat and stops itching and pain.
Disperses Wind, clears Heat, vents rashes and relieves itching.

symptoms: A burning sensation on the skin surface

modifications.purpose: severe Wind and Heat in the Blood
Wind-Heat in the Lungs with dry stools
coughing and shortness of breath due to Wind-Cold
